src:
Borrleverantören Drillcon ökar resultatet men minskar omsättningen
First North-listade Drillcon hade en nettoomsättning på 91,8 miljoner kronor (94,7) under det tredje kvartalet 2019.
06 Nov 2019, 08:12 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Drillcon drill supplier increases profit but reduces sales
First North listed Drillcon had net sales of SEK 91.8 million (94.7) during the third quarter of 2019.
06 Nov 2019, 08:12 by News Agency Direct
